EmailTemplate.name: Test_BizStarter_Pricing
EmailTemplate.subject: Following up on our conversation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was a pleasure speaking to you again about your business. Below, I have provided a breakdown of the package(s) that we discussed today:
Economy LLC/Corporation Package: $99.00 (7 – 8 weeks) CA State Filing Fee: $85.00/$115.00 Federal Tax Identification Number (EIN) Obtainment: $79.00 S Corporation Election Obtainment: $80.00 Sellers Permit Application Preparation: $35.00 State Tax ID Application Preparation: $35.00 Business Licenses Compliance Package: $74.99 Statement of Information Initial Report Filing: $55.00/$66.00 (Includes $20.00/$31.00 CA State Fee) Standard Shipping: $9.95
Total: $437.94
Standard LLC/Corporation Package: $289.00 (7 – 8 weeks) CA State Filing Fee: $85.00/$115.00 Federal Tax Identification Number (EIN) Obtainment: $79.00 S Corporation Election Obtainment: $80.00 Sellers Permit Application Preparation: $35.00 State Tax ID Application Preparation: $35.00 Business Licenses Compliance Package: $74.99 Statement of Information Initial Report Filing: $55.00/$66.00 (Includes $20.00/$31.00 CA State Fee) Standard Shipping: $9.95
Total: $627.94
Express Gold LLC/Corporation Package: $359.00 (2 – 3 weeks) CA State Filing Fee: $85.00/$115.00 Federal Tax Identification Number (EIN) Obtainment: $49.00 S Corporation Election Obtainment: $35.00 Sellers Permit Application Preparation: $35.00 State Tax ID Application Preparation: $35.00 Business Licenses Compliance Package: $74.99 Statement of Information Initial Report Filing: $55.00/$66.00 (Includes $20.00/$31.00 CA State Fee) 30 Day Trial of Attorney Access: Included (normally $29.99/month)
Total: $657.99
The Registered Agent Service is another optional service that may be added to any package for an annual fee of $159.00. Please keep in mind that this service is charged only after the LLC is filed.
Finally, payment of the package you choose may be split into 3 monthly installments, and doing so will not affect the turnaround time.
As always, please don't hesitate to contact me with any questions you may have, or when you are ready to proceed. You can call me at (855) 787-1921 Monday–Friday from 8 a.m.–5 p.m. PT or email me anytime at BizHelp@legalzoom.com
Katherine C. Business Account Manager (855) 787-1921 BizHelp@legalzoom.com
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy.

Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
